column1: The S&P CNX Nifty closed at 4040.55 points on June 30, 2008 representing a decrease of -829.55 pts points (-17.03%), as compared to 4870.1 points on May 30, 2008. During the month of June 2008, S&P CNX Nifty touched a high of 4908.8 points on June 02, 2008 before closing at 4040.55 points on June 30, 2008. The market capitalisation of  S&P CNX Nifty decreased from Rs.2933759 crores on May 30, 2008 to Rs.2434104 crores on June 30, 2008, i.e. a decrease of Rs.499655 crores (-17.03%)
* Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-July-2007 to 30-June-2008
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-June-2008 to 30-June-2008
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is for a portfolio of Rs. 50 Lakhs
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is the weightage average impact cost
